SEARCH
Package lt.techin.philatelist

Interface Philatelist

public interface Philatelist
Interface for a philatelist, a collector of post stamps.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addToCollection(PostStamp postStamp)
    Adds a post stamp to the collection.
    double
    calculateTotalMarketPrice()
    Calculates the total market price of all post stamps in the collection.
    List<PostStamp>
    findPostStampsByNameContaining(String nameFragment)
    Returns a list of post stamps whose names contain the given string, ignoring case sensitivity.
    double
    getAveragePostStampPrice()
    Calculates the average market price of post stamps in the collection.
    int
    getNumberOfPostStampsInCollection()
    Gets the number of post stamps in the collection.
    List<PostStamp>
    getSortedPostStampsByName()
    Returns a list of post stamps in the collection sorted alphabetically by name.
    PostStamp
    getTheMostExpensivePostStampByMarketValue()
    Retrieves the most expensive post stamp in the collection by market value.

    Prints the names of all post stamps in the collection.

    printPostStampsWithPriceGreaterThan(double price)
    Prints the names of post stamps in the collection that have a market price larger than the given price.

  • Method Details

    • addToCollection

      void addToCollection(PostStamp postStamp)
      Adds a post stamp to the collection. Philatelist should not add another post stamp he already has.
      Parameters:
      postStamp - the post stamp to add to the collection
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - when null or post stamp with null or empty name is passed

    • getNumberOfPostStampsInCollection

      int getNumberOfPostStampsInCollection()
      Gets the number of post stamps in the collection.
      Returns:
      the number of post stamps in the collection

    • printAllPostStampNames

      void printAllPostStampNames()
      Prints the names of all post stamps in the collection.

    • printPostStampsWithPriceGreaterThan

      void printPostStampsWithPriceGreaterThan(double price)
      Prints the names of post stamps in the collection that have a market price larger than the given price.
      Parameters:
      price - the price threshold above which post stamps will be printed

    • isPostStampInCollection

      boolean isPostStampInCollection(PostStamp postStamp)
      Checks if a given post stamp is in the collection.
      Parameters:
      postStamp - the post stamp to check for in the collection
      Returns:
      true if the post stamp is in the collection, false otherwise

    • isPostStampWithNameInCollection

      boolean isPostStampWithNameInCollection(String name)
      Checks if a post stamp with a given name is in the collection.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the post stamp to check for in the collection
      Returns:
      true if a post stamp with the given name is in the collection, false otherwise

    • calculateTotalMarketPrice

      double calculateTotalMarketPrice()
      Calculates the total market price of all post stamps in the collection.
      Returns:
      the total market price of all post stamps

    • getAveragePostStampPrice

      double getAveragePostStampPrice()
      Calculates the average market price of post stamps in the collection.
      Returns:
      the average price of post stamps

    • getTheMostExpensivePostStampByMarketValue

      PostStamp getTheMostExpensivePostStampByMarketValue()
      Retrieves the most expensive post stamp in the collection by market value.
      Returns:
      the most expensive post stamp

    • findPostStampsByNameContaining

      List<PostStamp> findPostStampsByNameContaining(String nameFragment)
      Returns a list of post stamps whose names contain the given string, ignoring case sensitivity.
      Parameters:
      nameFragment - the string to search for in post stamp names
      Returns:
      a list of post stamps matching the criteria

    • getSortedPostStampsByName

      List<PostStamp> getSortedPostStampsByName()
      Returns a list of post stamps in the collection sorted alphabetically by name.
      Returns:
      a sorted list of post stamps
